enumeratedValues.description: No destination bus error.

enumeratedValues.name: ERROR
enumeratedValues.description: The most-recently recorded error was a bus error on a destination write.

enumeratedValues.name: NO_ERROR
enumeratedValues.description: No source bus error.

enumeratedValues.description: The most-recently recorded error was a bus error on a source read.

enumeratedValues.name: NO_ERROR
enumeratedValues.description: No scatter/gather configuration error.

enumeratedValues.name: ERROR
enumeratedValues.description: The most-recently recorded error was a configuration error detected in the TCDn_DLASTSGA field.

enumeratedValues.name: NO_ERROR
enumeratedValues.description: No NBYTES/CITER configuration error.

enumeratedValues.name: ERROR
enumeratedValues.description: The most-recently recorded error was a configuration error detected in the TCDn_NBYTES or TCDn_CITER fields. TCDn_NBYTES is not a multiple of TCDn_ATTR[SSIZE] and TCDn_ATTR[DSIZE], or TCDn_CITER[CITER] = 0, or TCDn_CITER[ELINK] is not equal to TCDn_BITER[ELINK].

enumeratedValues.name: NO_ERROR
enumeratedValues.description: No destination offset configuration error.

enumeratedValues.name: ERROR
enumeratedValues.description: The most-recently recorded error was a configuration error detected in the TCDn_DOFF field. TCDn_DOFF is inconsistent with TCDn_ATTR[DSIZE].

enumeratedValues.name: NO_ERROR
enumeratedValues.description: No destination address configuration error.

enumeratedValues.name: ERROR
enumeratedValues.description: The most-recently recorded error was a configuration error detected in the TCDn_DADDR field. TCDn_DADDR is inconsistent with TCDn_ATTR[DSIZE].

enumeratedValues.name: NO_ERROR
enumeratedValues.description: No source offset configuration error.

enumeratedValues.name: ERROR
enumeratedValues.description: The most-recently recorded error was a configuration error detected in the TCDn_SOFF field. TCDn_SOFF is inconsistent with TCDn_ATTR[SSIZE].

enumeratedValues.name: NO_ERROR
enumeratedValues.description: No source address configuration error.

enumeratedValues.name: ERROR
enumeratedValues.description: The most-recently recorded error was a configuration error detected in the TCDn_SADDR field. TCDn_SADDR is inconsistent with TCDn_ATTR[SSIZE].

ERRCHN.name: ERRCHN
ERRCHN.description: Error Channel Number or Canceled Channel Number

enumeratedValues.name: NO_ERROR
enumeratedValues.description: No channel priority error.

enumeratedValues.name: ERROR
enumeratedValues.description: The most-recently recorded error was a configuration error in the channel priorities within a group. Channel priorities within a group are not unique.

enumeratedValues.name: NO_ERROR
enumeratedValues.description: No group priority error.

enumeratedValues.name: ERROR
enumeratedValues.description: The most-recently recorded error was a configuration error among the group priorities. All group priorities are not unique.

enumeratedValues.name: NO_CANCELS
enumeratedValues.description: No canceled transfers

enumeratedValues.name: CANCELED
enumeratedValues.description: The most-recently recorded entry was a canceled transfer initiated by the error cancel transfer field

VLD.name: VLD
